abstract: Brandon M. Magnan claimed to be part of security for the presidentâ€™s helicopter and was able to get through two checkpoints at Palm Beach International Airport, the authorities said.
lead_paragraph: A former United States Marine posed as a security team member for Marine One, the helicopter that transports President Trump, and breached two checkpoints last week at Palm Beach International Airport, the authorities said.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
